title: Bills still hurting, Dolphins respect, Steelers playoff hopes, Week 14 Bounce backs, and Fantasy Picks
itunes:title: Bills still hurting, Dolphins respect, Steelers playoff hopes, Week 14 Bounce backs, and Fantasy Picks
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and fmr Pro Bowl RB Maurice Jones-Drew discuss the Bills being at a crossroads after losing to the Patriots and now heading to Tampa to face Tom Brady. Peter wants to give respect to the Dolphins and their five game winning streak while we ask which team needs to keep their momentum moving. The crew looks at what the Steelers need to do in order to make the playoffs and which team will have a bounce back performance in Week 14. Kay wraps the show with her Which Guy Wednesday Fantasy Football picks.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
